review: I love Amazon TV! Its better than having to pay for cable and I use it everyday. I can even play music if I am working out or cleaning through the TV.

review: Totally worth every penny and love the voice activation!  I did quite a bit of research before purchasing this as I am cutting the cable cord for the first time.  If you have Amazon Prime, this is a no-brainer!  There is so much available to you through Prime and other apps, too!  I really don't miss cable, but I do need to go get an antenna for local channels for local news.

review: Love it! Had no idea how much I'd enjoy it. Only thing I would do better is make the remote a little bigger, have the buttons glow. Got Netflix through the medium and they make it easy. For me, I can't say Netflix is better. I think Amazon total package Definitely worth it.Also I bought 3 additional fire sticks for my other Tv's & they work great!!
